thread.title: Spice Girls announce plans to explore 'new opportunities together'

title: Spice Girls announce plans to explore 'new opportunities together'
text:
Spice Girls announce plans to explore 'new opportunities together' 1:40pm EST - 01:00 
British pop-music girl band, the Spice Girls who topped the charts in the nineties, announced that they will be regrouping. Pascale Davies reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
British pop-music girl band, the Spice Girls who topped the charts in the nineties, announced that they will be regrouping. Pascale Davies reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2nFBOop
